Title: Expands the definition of aggravated cruelty to animals
Summary: Expands the definition of aggravated cruelty to animals to include serious physical injuries or the use of a weapon.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to enhanced penalties for aggravated cruelty to animals
